chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (d d' : preDTA) (m : Map bool), ensemble_base state d (predta_coacc_0 d d' m)

Premises:
predta_coacc_0 = fix predta_coacc_0 (d d' : preDTA) (m : Map bool) {struct d'} : Map bool := match d' with | @M0 _ => match m with | @M0 _ | _ => map_mini state d end | @M1 _ a s => match m with | @M1 _ a' b => if (a =? a')%N && b then st_coacc d s else map_mini state d | _ => map_mini state d end | @M2 _ x y => match m with | @M2 _ z t => map_or (predta_coacc_0 d x z) (predta_coacc_0 d y t) | _ => map_mini state d end end : preDTA -> preDTA -> Map bool -> Map bool
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
ensemble_base : forall A : Set, Map A -> Map bool -> Prop
state = Map prec_list : Set
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
preDTA = Map state : Set
map_replace_def_ok_d : forall (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (x : bool), ensemble_base state d m -> ensemble_base state d (map_replace bool m a x)
map_or_def_ok_d : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool), ensemble_base state d m0 -> ensemble_base state d m1 -> ensemble_base state d (map_or m0 m1)
predta_ref_ok_check_correct_0 : forall d d' : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d d' -> predta_ref_ok_check_0 d d' = true
predta_ref_ok_check_complete_0 : forall d d' : preDTA, predta_ref_ok_check_0 d d' = true -> preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d d'
predta_coacc = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : Map bool) => map_replace bool (predta_coacc_0 d d m) a true : preDTA -> ad -> Map bool -> Map bool
preDTA_ref_ok_distinct = fun d d' : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d' : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
predta_ref_ok_check_0 = fix predta_ref_ok_check_0 (d d' : preDTA) {struct d} : bool := match d with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ _ s => state_ref_ok_check s d' | @M2 _ x y => predta_ref_ok_check_0 x d' && predta_ref_ok_check_0 y d' end : preDTA -> preDTA -> bool
lattice_bounded_10 : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A) (p : prechain bool), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m) lem p -> chain_length bool p <= S (MapCard A m)
pl_coacc_def_ok : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list), ensemble_base state d (pl_coacc d pl)
st_coacc_def_ok : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state), ensemble_base state d (st_coacc d s)
map_or_mapget_true_rd : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), ensemble_base state d m0 -> ensemble_base state d m1 -> MapGet bool m1 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true
map_or_mapget_true_ld : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), ensemble_base state d m0 -> ensemble_base state d m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true
map_replace_mapget_ins_true_0 : forall (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (b : bool), MapGet bool m a = Some b -> MapGet bool (map_replace bool m a true) a = Some true
semantic_equiv_0_6 : forall (n : nat) (t : term) (t0 : term_list), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : nat), rec_term d a t m = true -> reconnaissance d a t) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (m : nat), rec_list_terms d p t0 m = true -> liste_reconnait d p t0) -> forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), rec_list_terms d p (tcons t t0) n = true -> liste_reconnait d p (tcons t t0)
map_maxi_appartient : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), ensemble_base A x (map_maxi A x)
map_mini_appartient : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), ensemble_base A x (map_mini A x)
lattice_bounded_1 : forall m : Map bool, lattice_bounded_def_1 (single bool m)
lattice_bounded_0 : forall m : Map bool, lattice_bounded_def_0 (single bool m)
lattice_bounded_2 : forall p : prechain bool, lattice_bounded_def_1 p -> forall m : Map bool, lattice_bounded_def_1 (concat bool p m)
lattice_bounded_3 : forall p : prechain bool, lattice_bounded_def_0 p -> forall m : Map bool, lattice_bounded_def_0 (concat bool p m)
lattice_bounded_8 : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A), lattice_bounded_def_2 A m -> forall m0 : Map A, lattice_bounded_def_2 A m0 -> lattice_bounded_def_2 A (M2 A m m0)
coacc_id : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> coacc d a a
coacc_transitive_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> coacc_transitive_def d a a
map_replace_def_ok : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (x : A), domain_equal A A m (map_replace A m a x)
lem_reflexive = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => lem x0 x0) I (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) => eq_ind_r (fun b : bool => if b then leb a0 a0 else False) (leb_reflexive a0) (N.eqb_refl a)) (fun (m : Map bool) (H : lem m m) (m0 : Map bool) (H0 : lem m0 m0) => conj H H0) x : r_reflexive bool lem
rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t
lem_get_leb : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad) (b0 b1 : bool), lem m0 m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some b0 -> MapGet bool m1 a = Some b1 -> leb b0 b1
Inductive coacc : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop := coacc_id : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> coacc d a a | coacc_nxt : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc d a0 a2
lattice_bounded_def_1 = fun p : prechain bool => lattice_bounded_def_0 p -> forall m : Map bool, lattice_bounded_def_0 (concat bool p m) : prechain bool -> Prop
coacc_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> P d a a) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> P d a0 a1 -> P d a0 a2) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a a0 : ad), coacc p a a0 -> P p a a0

```coq
Require Import Coq.Init.Wf.

Lemma ensemble_base_state_d_predta_coacc_0 :
  forall (d d' : preDTA) (m : Map bool),
  ensemble_base state d (predta_coacc_0 d d' m).
Proof.
  intros.
  induction d'; crush.
  - destruct m; auto.
  - destruct m; auto.
  - destruct m; auto.
Qed.
```
